summary: Durham is slowly dying like the tobacco business, it once depended on. Leroy comes to Durham with a business plan. He rents an old warehouse from a cash-strapped old tobacco heiress.
cast: Colin Firth|Ellen Burstyn|Patricia Clarkson|Orlando Bloom|Amber Tamblyn|Margo Martindale|Andrew McCarthy|Victoria Clark|Isiah Whitlock Jr.|Tom Wopat|Viktor Hernandez|Juan Piedrahita|Thomas Upchurch|Reid Dalton|Amy da Luz|Nadya Simpson|Rick Hamilton|Martin Thompson|J.W. Smith|Veda Wilson|Cheryl McConnell|Gezell Fleming|Stuart Hough|Cheri Varnadoe|Andrea Powell|Edna Lee Figueroa|Luis Lopez|Michael Fraguada|Rose Davidson|Todd Davis|Ivory Dortch|Cricket Ellis|Nick Errato|Liam Ferguson|Tyler Getzelmann|Los Hickson|Christopher Houldsworth|Alena Koch|Gary Ray Moore|Anna Nalepka|Pierre Ortiz|Anita Richter|John Rutland|Kathy Scruggs|Jacques Shy|Matt Whitnack
title: Calle principal
